survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of professional networking events to improve future events and enhance attendee experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for standardized responses. Ensure mobile-friendly design for quick selection.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons. Randomize options to reduce bias.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice format recommended to capture diverse attendee preferences. Include an 'Other' option with open-text for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes. Include an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make at the event?
questions.client_notes: Use predefined ranges for easier analysis. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make at the event?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving future networking events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text with character limit.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving future networking events?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this event to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to gauge event advocacy. Include as a quick final question.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this event to a colleague?
